short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly view any compatible web page in Instapaper's text view.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 0.4:
Updated manifest to version 3.
Version 0.3:
New retina icon. I hope you like it.
Version 0.2:
Clicking the icon will do nothing if already displaying a site in Instapaper's text view. 
Changed manifest to version 2.
